Quiz_questions.question: Best known for his Meditations on Stoic philosophy. Marcus Aurelius has symbolized for many generations in the West the Golden Age of the Roman Empire.
Jenny has symbolized for many generations in the West the Golden Age of the Roman Empire.
Mary Walstonecroft was an english writer and passionate advocate of educational and social equality for women.
Thomas Aquinas was an italian Dominican theologian, the foremost medieval Scholastic.
Confucius was a french writer and feminist, a member of the intellectual fellowship of philosopher-writers.
Thomas Hobbes is best known for his Meditations on Stoic philosophy.
Friedrich Nietzsche was a German classical scholar and philosopher.
Simone de Beauvoir was an english philosopher, scientist, and historian, best known for his political philosophy, especially as articulated in his masterpiece Leviathan (1651).
Thomas Hobbes was an english philosopher, scientist, and historian, best known for his political philosophy, especially as articulated in his masterpiece Leviathan (1651).
Friedrich Nietzsche was a feminist and a philosopher.
